column4: Hello everyone I have a problem that my sound doesn't work on my sony vaio since the latest update of ubuntu. Any idea's what could be the problem? Here is my dump http://pastebin.ca/1729377
i can listen to it if i click the other player link You can now play JewishBroadcast.com in your favorite player
with the mplayer plugin for mozilla
i suspect that totem or vlc plugins will work too
if you copy the url http://jb2.jewishbroadcast.com:8010/listen.pls and go to totem Open>Open url it works too
maybe the dir is not readable for your user?
stop using comments starting with # in your php code ?
aeon-ltd please look at the filenames in my error
aeon-ltd please look at the filenames in my error obviously i didn't touch them
looks like a bug report would be the best action ?
and aeon-ltd please look over here http://www.asim.pk/2010/06/21/php-depreciated-errors-on-ubuntu-10-04-lts/ should'nt it be fixed already
